tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_reports(
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    product_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE SalesReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_sold INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  order_date DATE
);
